title: 'I want a cat' and other stories by Tony Ross
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "Anytime tales". Five zany and humorous tales are told in this selection of animated stories by award-winning children's author, Tony Ross. "I want a cat": Jessy wants a cat but her parents are not keen on the idea. "I want my potty": poor little princess is fed up with nappies but coming to terms with her potty is not so easy. "Super dooper Jezebel": being perfect isn't easy unless of course you are Super Dooper Jezebel. "Oscar got the blame": Oscar's friend Billy brings mud into the house, dresses the dog and puts frogs in Granny's slippers - so why does Oscar always get the blame? "I'm coming to get you": little Tommy Brown is terrified of scary monsters, but this monster is different.
